title: FIFA 22
description: Powered by Football™, EA SPORTS™ FIFA 22 brings the game even closer to the real thing with fundamental gameplay advances and a new season of innovation across every mode. HyperMotion integrates advanced full-team mocap data and machine learning to heighten gameplay in every match in FIFA 22, delivering the most realistic and fluid gameplay experience we’ve ever built. This game includes optional purchase of virtual currency that can be used to acquire a random selection of virtual in-game items through “packs”. EA displays pack probabilities in-game. See ‘Loot box drop rates’ below for information on how probabilities are calculated.
notes: PERSISTENT INTERNET CONNECTION, EA ACCOUNT, & ACCEPTANCE OF EA USER AGREEMENT (terms.ea.com) REQUIRED TO PLAY. EA'S PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY APPLIES (privacy.ea.com). YOU CONSENT TO ANY PERSONAL DATA COLLECTED THROUGH YOUR USE OF EA’S SERVICES BEING TRANSFERRED TO THE UNITED STATES, AS FURTHER EXPLAINED IN THE PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY. ACCESS TO SOFTWARE CONTENT IS LIMITED TO ONE EA ACCOUNT & IS NON-TRANSFERABLE AFTER PURCHASE. AGE RESTRICTIONS APPLY, SEE http://o.ea.com/ea/child-access. EA MAY PROVIDE CERTAIN FREE INCREMENTAL CONTENT &/OR UPDATES. EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON ea.com/service-updates. FIFA POINTS NOT AVAILABLE IN BELGIUM.
